design_philosophy.theme: The Modern Malgudi - Authentic Warmth meets Digital Utility
core_values: Fusion over Imitation: Traditional South Indian aesthetics mixed with modern SaaS-level utility
Emotion First: Every interaction should feel 'homely' and 'hygienic'
Content is King: The food is the hero. No stock-photo generic people unless necessary
Mobile First: 80% of users will be on phone. Buttons must be thumb-friendly

rules: Use Playfair Display for all Section Headings and Dish Names
Use Poppins for descriptions, prices, and UI elements (buttons, nav)
Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text

usage.primary: Main CTAs, Active States, Heavy Borders, Icons
usage.secondary: Price tags, 'Best Seller' badges, Hover states
usage.background: Main canvas (apply subtle noise texture if possible)
usage.text: Main content. Never use pure black (#000000)

buttons.primary: bg-[#1E6F5C] text-white hover:bg-[#165244] rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border-2 border-[#1E6F5C] text-[#1E6F5C] hover:bg-[#1E6F5C] hover:text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all
buttons.whatsapp: bg-[#25D366] text-white rounded-full p-4 shadow-lg hover:bg-[#20bd5a] transition-all fixed bottom-20 right-4 z-50 md:bottom-8 md:right-8 flex items-center gap-2

cards.dish_card: bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm border border-[#E5E5E0] overflow-hidden hover:shadow-md transition-all group
cards.feature_card: bg-[#F2F2F0] p-8 rounded-2xl border border-transparent hover:border-[#D4A373] transition-all

navigation.mobile_bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white border-t border-gray-200 p-4 flex justify-around items-center z-50 md:hidden shadow-[0_-4px_6px_-1px_rgba(0,0,0,0.1)]

assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Prefer rounded variants.

hero.style: Split layout or Bento Grid. Left: Strong Headline + CTA. Right: High-quality food collage.
hero.content: Headline: 'Authentic Taste of South India in Bhubaneswar'. Subhead: 'Pure Veg | Hygienic | Homely'. CTA: 'Order Now' & 'View Menu'

menu.style: Categorized List. No PDF. Use 'Tabs' component for categories (South Indian, Chinese, etc.).
menu.item_style: Flex row. Name (Bold) ....... Price (Color). Description below.

location.style: Full width map embed with overlay card for address and hours.

motion.scroll: Use IntersectionObserver to fade-in sections as they scroll into view.
motion.hover: Subtle lift (-2px) on cards. Color fill on outline buttons.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure all text on #FAFAF7 is #2B2B2B or darker.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements (color: #1E6F5C).
accessibility.aria_labels: Required for all icon-only buttons (WhatsApp, Call).

4. Use the provided image URLs for the respective sections.
5. Do not use generic 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use real food names (Masala Dosa, Idli, Veg Hakka Noodles, Paneer Butter Masala).
6. Ensure the 'Parcel Charge: â‚¹5/box' is mentioned in the menu or footer.
7. Add the 'Click-to-Call' functionality on the phone number: 933754213.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
